Section.name: About KEC
Section.description:
Kuppam Engineering College was started in the year 2001. The college offers Bachelor and Master Programme in Engineering. It also offers Diploma and Professional courses

Library
The Library has computerized catalogue to find out the availability of books and has a 30,000+ books and 5,000+ CD-ROMs help the students to access the information more quickly.The college has air-conditioned digital library subscribed to ALCTE-INDEST to share e-journals & e-books. High speed 16 mbps leased line was provided to access internet.
Seminar Halls
The college has well-equipped and well-furnished 4 seminar halls.
Auditorium
The college one outdoor auditorium with the capacity of 4,000 and indoor auditorium with the capacity of 600 students.
Hostel
The college has 2 hostels:
